title: Digital Round Watch Face
summary: A beautiful circular face for your Android Wear
description: Digital Round Watch Face, a beautiful display for your Android Wear.This face was made for circular watches, but works perfectly with square watches as well.Characteristics:Innovative design: check the time on a display with a beautiful design;Ambient Mode: enjoy the Digital Round Watch Face when the clock is on ambient mode;AM/PM: The face is adjusted according to the chosen format on your smartphone;Colors: touch the face to get a new color. New colors will be added soon!Battery life: view the battery life of your watch right on the face;Temperature: the face now shows the temperature on the user's location (requires permission for location) ;App companion: use the app to directly configure the face of your wearable device. More features will be added soon.Add a beautiful face to your wearable device. Download the Digital Round Watch Face.
descriptionHTML:
Digital Round Watch Face, a beautiful display for your Android Wear.
This face was made for circular watches, but works perfectly with square watches as well.

Characteristics:
Innovative design: check the time on a display with a beautiful design;
Ambient Mode: enjoy the Digital Round Watch Face when the clock is on ambient mode;
AM/PM: The face is adjusted according to the chosen format on your smartphone;
Colors: touch the face to get a new color. New colors will be added soon!
Battery life: view the battery life of your watch right on the face;
Temperature: the face now shows the temperature on the user's location (requires permission for location) ;
App companion: use the app to directly configure the face of your wearable device. More features will be added soon.

Add a beautiful face to your wearable device. Download the Digital Round Watch Face.
comments: 1 more star for English in the app. Another star for Fahrenheit and larger numbers. Other than that, nice watch. Great job with the update. 5 stars from me. Would love to see font size adjustment, and custom color setting.  Keep up the good work.
recentChanges: New setting to change the fonts;
